io.catalyze.sdk.android

Class CatalyzeRequest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.volley.Request<T>
      • com.android.volley.toolbox.JsonRequest<T>
        • io.catalyze.sdk.android.CatalyzeRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<com.android.volley.Request<T>>

    public class CatalyzeRequest<T>
extends com.android.volley.toolbox.JsonRequest<T>
    This class handles all Catalyze JSON network requests. All calls are here are made asynchronously using the Android Volley library.
